mapper.insert: insert into reserve_record(orderId, hotelId, openId, uname, phoneNumber, roomType, reserveTime, preFee, status, startTime, endTime) values (#{orderId}, #{hotelId}, #{openId}, #{uname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{roomType}, #{reserveTime}, #{preFee}, 0, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: select orderId, hotelId, roomType, preFee, status, startTime, endTime from reserve_record where openId=#{openId}
